lead_paragraph: A traffic police post was heavily damaged by the blasts, and at least one officer was killed by gunfire, according to witnesses speaking to a local television station.

headline.main: Bomb Blasts and Gunfire Rip Through Jakarta
headline.print_headline: Bomb Blasts and Gunfire Rip Through Jakarta

snippet: A traffic police post was heavily damaged by the blasts, and at least one officer was killed by gunfire, according to witnesses speaking to a local television station.
